content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the alytaus district court the court has decided to dissolve the marriage between the applicant and the defendant the defendant has been awarded three gas pistols and half of an apartment as part of the division of property the defendant has also been ordered to pay the applicant compensation in the amount of eur 313507 the text discusses various aspects related to joint matrimonial property including the right to compensation grounds for terminating the matrimonial community property and the fulfillment of obligations by spouses the court considered the evidence and arguments presented by both parties and made a decision the court awarded the apartment to the applicant and ordered the defendant to pay compensation the court also divided the weapons and ordered the payment of maintenance costs for the apartment the court has allowed the action and counterclaim of the parties involved the marriage is being dissolved due to the fault of both spouses the court has awarded the applicant with half of the apartment and the defendant with the other half the defendant has also been granted personal ownership of a company the court has ordered the defendant to keep certain weapons and pay the applicant compensation and costs the remaining parts of the application and counterclaim have been dismissed
